subs.text: @sacjai Friendly grep -rl : "healthcare" ==> health care (two words emphasizes that health < = > care) ... and "system" ==> "bowl of spaghetti." Systems are intentionally designed. What we have is not - I therefore prefer not to be so generous as my kinder friend, @sacjai. [link]
subs.rawText: @sacjai Friendly grep -rl :  "healthcare" ==> health care (two words emphasizes that health < = > care) ... and "system" ==> "bowl of spaghetti."   Systems are intentionally designed.  What we have is not -  I therefore prefer not to be so generous as my kinder friend, @sacjai. https://t.co/xkOcRsmBWT

subs.text: @HealthIT_Policy Cousin Steve, it kinda feels like y'all posted the headline and then .. "continued on page 7" but the newspaper ends on page 6!  I'll quote my 8th grade English Teacher:  "so what?"  What's the lesson here?  Complaints < > findings.  What were the findings? Consequences?
